entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Service Worker is not updated on save or build #47388
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #47386
  • Dictionary<string, object> in Form has null value #47383
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47382
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #47381
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc, plaintext #47380
  • Blazor Hybrid wrapper for hls.js fails to play hls media served on local LAN #47379

Closed

  • IIS Express process memory size is not decreased. #47351
  • Different implementations of `GenerateRadioButton()` and `GenerateCheckBox()` in `DefaultHtmlGenerator.cs` #46535
  • gRPC JSON transcoding query string binding doesn't support directly converting known types #46753
  • OnStarting cannot be set because the response has already started. #47371
  • String array queries do not use commas to separate each element #46530

PullRequests

Created

  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding to prioritize JSON name #47385
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47354
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Resolve parent cultures via parent property instead of string process… #47365
    area-mvc, area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, pending-ci-rerun
  • Run Mvc.Razor.HelperResult callbacks inline #47373
    area-mvc
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
